directions: Force eggs through a sieve into a small bowl and gently toss with onion.
Trim 36 pumpernickel slices to 1 1/4-inch squares, then top each with 1/2 teaspoon sour cream, 1/2 teaspoon egg, and 1/2 teaspoon caviar.
ingredients: Garnish: fresh chervil or chopped fresh chives
title: Caviar on Pumpernickel with Sour Cream
